name: Cleric's Burden
description:
You are the party's sole healer. Stay alive and keep your party alive through 6 waves of bosses ! 

Keys: 

Movement: WASD 
Rotate Team Memebr: Space
Ability: 1 (heal) & 2 (block)

This game was made to purely work with object pooling and learn more about it. At the same time attempting to make a clone of vampire survivor without having playing one. Eventually, I cheated and looked at a wikipedia.

Also the game is not exactly bug free as I ran out of time and the scope was too large. Tho, was a good experience.
